UKESM1-0-LL-ssp585-1-0.comment: Prepared using CMIP6 model UKESM1-0-LL as input. A combination of historical and ssp585 datasets were used to create this ISMIP6 forcing dataset
UKESM1-0-LL-ssp585-1-0.institution: NASA Goddard Space Flight Center, Greenbelt, MD 20771, USA
UKESM1-0-LL-ssp585-1-0.references: Experimental protocol for sealevel projections from ISMIP6 standalone ice sheet models, Nowicki, S. et al, 2020, https://doi.org/10.5194/tc-2019-322
UKESM1-0-LL-ssp585-1-0.source: UKESM1-0-LL-ssp585-1-0 derived dataset computed from CMIP6 UKESM1-0-LL historical and ssp585 simulations for ISMIP6
UKESM1-0-LL-ssp585-1-0.source_description: Ice sheet relevant datasets produced by the ISMIP6 Team for the standalone ice sheet experiment of ISMIP6
